options.content:
Realtime Traffic and Hits Data are estimates. Finalized Traffic data does not appear until 1 to 2 days in a rears. Most of this dashboard depends on infomration from cpcodes other than the "all" cpcode.
Data for these dashboards come from the following APIs
- todaytraffic-by-time - v1 - https://developer.akamai.com/api/core_features/reporting/todaytraffic-by-time.html
- estimatedecresponse-by-time - v1 - https://developer.akamai.com/api/core_features/reporting/estimatedecresponse-by-time.html

panels.title: Overall Account Traffic and Hits - "all" CPCode
Overall Account Hits by Response Group - "all" CPCode
Current Traffic Distribution by CPCode Selection

list.definition: show TAG VALUES on telegraf FROM "bytes-by-cpcode" WITH KEY = "accountid"
list.label: AccountId
list.name: accountid
list.query: show TAG VALUES on telegraf FROM "bytes-by-cpcode" WITH KEY = "accountid"

list.definition: show TAG VALUES on telegraf FROM "todaytraffic-by-time" WITH KEY = "cpcode"
list.name: cpcodes_available
list.query: show TAG VALUES on telegraf FROM "todaytraffic-by-time" WITH KEY = "cpcode"

list.definition: show TAG VALUES on telegraf FROM "cpcodes-index" WITH KEY = "cpcodeNameNum" WHERE "cpcode" =~ /$cpcodes_available/
list.label: CPCode Selection
list.name: cpcodes_selection
list.query: show TAG VALUES on telegraf FROM "cpcodes-index" WITH KEY = "cpcodeNameNum" WHERE "cpcode" =~ /$cpcodes_available/

list.name: cpcode
list.query: show TAG VALUES on telegraf FROM "cpcodes-index" WITH KEY = "cpcode" WHERE "cpcodeNameNum" =~ /^($cpcodes_selection)$/
